choices: A messy room of a tree house (Link's house)
A clean room  with everything colored green (Saria's house)
A royal bedroom with everything colored pink (Zelda's room)
A wooden room with a view of horses through the window (Malon's room)
1.content:
Navi was flying through Hyrule fields on a rainy afternoon. it had been one month since she had abandoned Link in the temple of time and went off on her own. Navi was at the entrance to the Kokiri Forest when she was zapped by a bolt of lightning and passed out.
When she awoke she saw her wings were burnt making it imposable to fly. Navi noticed she was trapped in a bottle which frightened her to no end the one thing all fairies fear are bottles. realizing there was no escape she walked over to the edge of her clear prison and saw....
1.title: Captured

11.content:
A messy room of a tree house that she quickly figured out was Link's. Navi soon realized that this could be the best or worst situation for her. On one hand they were partners on an epic quest and formed a strong friendship. but on the other hand she left him as soon as the quest was over because he wasn't a Kokiri.

Navi then herd someone coming up the ladder of the tree house. Seconds later Link was in his house and was walking over to Navi's bottle and....
11.title: Link

choices: You need to be punished for leaving me
111.content:
Link opened up the bottle and carefully placed Navi on his table.

"Ah good you're awake." Link said "How are you feeling Navi?"

"Okay i guess but what happened and why am I here?" Navi asked.

"Well you got struck by lightning and the only way to safely carry you was in the bottle, you've been out cold for three days!" Link answered.

"Thanks for helping me." Navi said sheepishly looking away from him ashamed of leaving him. "I'm sorry that I left you but the rules if the great fairies are absolute. Fairies are not allowed to be the guardians of non-Kokiri."

"Oh well that's not a problem." Link replied calmly making Navi give him a quizzical look.

"And why is that?" Questioned the confused fairy.

"Well when I returned to the forest after we saved the world, the Deku Tree turned me into a full fledged Kokiri." Link answered happily.

"That means I can be your guardian!!" Navi exclaimed. "Let's go rub it in Mido's face I'm sure he's been teasing you non-stop since I left."

"That sounds great Navi." Link said. "But first I think....
111.title: Forgiving hero

1111.content:
"You need to be punished for leaving me." Link said

"What! Why? I didn't know I could stay!" Navi exclaimed

"Sorry Navi but you know the rules." Link answered. " When a guardian fairy ditches their Kokiri, that Kokiri gets to decide on the fairy's punishment.

"Please Link don't do it!" Navi begged

"I'm sorry Navi but it's one of the Deku Tree's rules and must be followed." Link said while picking her up.

Navi prepared for the worst, closed her eyes, and waited for pain. After a few minutes Navi felt a strange sensation it wasn't painful like she thought rather its made want to laugh. She opened her eyes to find that Link was tickleing her.

"Hahahah Link.ha ha.stop.. hahah please hahahhahaha." Navi said begged

"No way Navi" Link said enjoying the fact that he was making her beg "You need to be punished."

After a few more minutes of tickling Link decided that he had done enough and place Navi on the table where she tried to catch her breath.

"Okay Navi now that were done with that drink this healing potion." Link said.

Navi obliged and drank it instantly her wings grew back and she squealed in delight.

"My wings their back!" She cried.

"Okay so now that you have your wings back should we go see Saria of go beat up Mido?"
1111.title: Navi's Punishment

11111.content:
"I think we should see Saria." Navi said. "Good Idea." Link agreed. Navi fluttered above Link's Head, and he went to Saria's House. He opened the blind, and surprisingly, Saria was still sleeping, so she had the Blinds and Windows closed.

Sinibi, Saria's Fairy, was sleeping next to Saria's Head, and Link gave Saria a Kokiri Wake-Up Call. "Link. Navi came back!" Saria said joyfully. "Oh Really, I hadn't noticed." Link said sarcasticly. Sinibi and Navi were friends, and so were Link and Saria, so Saria gave Link a Kokiri Challenge.

"To get back and forth throughout Lost Woods, 3 Person Challenge, You, Me, and Mido." Saria asked. "Do you accept?"
11111.title: Saria's Challenge

choices: Put you in my boot as I take a walk around the village
Shake you around a bit knowing how much you fairies hate bottles
112.content:
Smiles down at Navi with evil intent.

"Hey Navi how are you doing?" The 10 year old said though a cruel grin.

"Link thank the goddesses it's you! quick uncork the bottle, and free me."

"Free you!?" said Link with an angry look. "why would I do that after you abandoned me?!"

Navi felt heart broken. Her best hope of freedom and help was pissed off at her.

"Link....." Began the little fairy with tears in her eyes. "I didn't want to leave but your not a Kokiri so i didn't have a choice."

"Well." said Link. "If you had stuck around you would have known that once I went back to the Kokiri Forest because of my bravery and saving the world from Ganondorf the Great Deku Tree turned me into a full blooded Kokiri.(i know the Deku Tree's supposed to be dead but in this one he survived the Ghoma attack) and i was picked on even worse because you left me! because apparently if a fairy leaves a Kokiri child it's like saying they aren't worth the time to care for! The only person who stayed friends with me was Saria and now that i have you right where i want you I'm going to make you suffer for what you've done to me!!! First I think i'll..."
112.title: Vengeance thy name is Link

1121.content:
"Put you in my boot as I take a walk around the village." Link finished. Navi screamed in terror as Link's hand wrapped around her small wingless body.
"Link stop please!" She begged while trying to free herself from the child's grasp. " If you do that i'll be crushed!" Link stopped for a second to take in the fairy's words. He knew she was right and as angry as he was at Navi he didn't want to kill her, get revenge yes but not kill. Then he remembered a special potion he was given by Zelda.
Link with Navi in hand went over to where he kept the potion. He uncorked it and dumped it all over his former guardian.
"There." Link stated. " Now you body cannot be crushed. You will sill feel the pain but your body won't be squished." Link then took off his left boot. One whiff of the stench made Navi gag.
"Link when was the last time you bathed!?" She yelled in disgust. Without an answer Navi was dropped into the boot where she was then pressed against the insole as Link put the boot on and went outside.
1121.title: Navi Underfoot

choices: "Sorry but I was really angry at you and I needed to let off some steam"
"Too bad that was only the beginning"
11211.content:
Link began the walk in the most painful way he could think of for Navi. He jumped off the top floor of his treehouse landing on his left foot. Navi felt an explosion of pain course through her being as Link's foot crushed her underneath it.
During the walk Link made sure to jump whenever possible and to stomp his left foot every few minutes to ensure pain for his former fairy partner.

For Navi the experience was hell. To begin her prison was dark, sweaty, and stinky. On top off that Link made sure she was in constant pain while trapped in the boot. No matter how loud she screamed she could not be heard but she could hear everything around her.

At one time durring the walk she heard a fight between Link and Mido where Mido had called him a worthless fairyless freak. Under normal circumstance Navi would comfort Link and tell him Mido was a loser but after the day she'd been having she decided Link deserved some teasing.

After that Link went home and took Navi out of his boot. Navi was relieved to finally be able to breath again with out inhaling Link's sweat.

"So Navi how did that feel?" Link asked.

"I was just crushed under the foot of someone who i thought was my friend for an entire day how the hell do you it felt!" Navi screamed up at the Kokiri.

Link's response was....

Go over to Saria's and torture her together

"Shake you around a bit knowing how much you fairies hate bottles!" Link finished. Link began shaking the bottle rapidly laughing as the tiny fairy bounced from side to side.

Navi however was screaming in pain as she collided with her glass prison. she started to cry as her once friend was abusing her. after about an hour and a million bruises later Link finaly decided to take Navi out of the bottle.

"So Navi did you enjoy that as much as i did?" he said while laughing at her pain. Navi just couldn't hold in her tears any more. she began crying begging Link to stop the torment.

"Please Link stop this."She cried. "I'm sorry i left you but i didn't know you were turned into a Kokiri please forgive my rashness." with tears in her eyes she looked up at Link whose expression still looked cold.

"I know your sorry Navi." He said with almost no emotion "but I still don't think your sorry enough!"
With that said Link then picked Navi up grabbed her panties from under her dress and gave her an atomic wedgie. The fairy screamed as her panties were pulled over her head. Link continued to laugh at her suffering when he got an idea

I wonder if i should show her to Saria or keep her to myself? he wondered.

Link picked up Navi and walked over to Saria's house.

Link knocked on the door and waited for her to answer with Navi hidden behind his back.

"Well i wanted to show you this." Link replied showing her a bruised up Navi trying with all of her might to break free from his grasp.

Saria gasped at the sight of her.

"Link what happened to her?" asked the shocked girl.

"oh I was just teaching a lesson about betraying her friends and how it has dire consequences, I came over here to see if you wanted to help me show her the error of her ways."

"Saria looked down at Navi and the then back at Link and....

112222.content:
Saria slapped Link across his face and gently took Navi from his hands.

"How dare you harm her!!" Saria yelled "You are just as bad as the rest of the Kokiri boys, I thought you were different but here you are harming an innocent fairy who didn't know she could still be your guardian!!!"

Link looked down and said "Saria I.."

"Leave now Link you are no longer welcome in my presence." Saria cut off looking scornfully at him.

Link walked away from Saria's house with one less friend and a saddened mood.

Sara had taken Navi inside and started tending to her bruises. Navi told her what had happened and how link had tortured her in a bottle.

"I can't believe how crule he was to you." Saria said looking at the fairy "So how is the potion working?"

Navi Looked up at her and smiled "Well my wings will still take a couple of days to heal but the bruises are gone."

"Well anyways it's almost time for bed so make yourself comfortable." Saria replied with a yawn as she headed for her bedroom. Navi followed her and the two quickly fell asleep.
the next morning was uneventful until...
112222.title: Saria's Kind Heart

choices: "Sorry Link but you'll have to earn my forgiveness."
1122221.content:
The two heard a knock on the door. Saria wondered who it was as she opened it. once the door was opened Link was seen. Saria put on a cold frown as Navi moved behind her in fear of Link and said.

"Link I told you stay out of my sight."

"I know." Link said sighed looking down with an ashamed look on his face."I just came by to apologies to Navi."

The two girls looked a little shocked at his statement. Navi peeked out from behind Saria far enough to see Link but back enough to keep herself protected.

Link took a deep breath and began. "Navi I'm really sorry for hurting you. I was very angry at you for leaving me but that was no reason to torture you. Just because i was picked on doesn't mean i can just go around harming things that can't fight back. I know what I did was wrong and I can understand if you never want to see me again. Navi can you ever forgive me?"

Once he was finished he looked up at them his eyes were filled with tears and showed that everything he said was sincere and from the heart.

Navi was now on Saria's shoulder. She looked at Link and said....

12.content:
A clean room made with everything colored green. Navi knew she was in Saria's House.

"Hello Navi it seems you've finally woke up." Saria said with a kind smile.

"Saria!!!!" Yelled Navi. "open this bottle i wish to leave." pleaded the fairy.

Saria's smile faded to a look of thought. "i don't know..." she said."ever sence you left link he has been crying non-stop. once his quest was over the Great Deku Tree turned him into a Kokiri as a reward. but since you left he was picked on mercilessly and shunned just like before."

"Oh my I didn't know he was a Kokiri, I wouldn't have left him if I knew." Navi said quietly.

"That may be the case but I am still thinking about what to do with you." Saria replied. "I SHOULD return you to Link so he can take care of you,,,But since you are so helpless right now with your wings burnt. I COULD punish you for leaving Link

Hearing these words made Navi shake with fear. "Saria!" She said with fright. "Think about what you're saying!!"

"Okay I've decided" Saria said. he opened the Jar and said..
12.title: Saria

121.content:
Saria started laughing at the small fairy in her hand.

          "Did you honestly think I would hurt you Navi" Saria said to the frightened small girl. "Harming innocent creatures is against my morals."

          "W-w-what are you going to do to me Saria?" Navi squeaked softly with fear still etched in her voice."

          'Why take you to Link of coarse silly." Saria replied while trying to calm the terrified fairy girl. "He really misses you ya know."

         With Navi in her hand Saria Climbed up Link's Tree house to find Him still asleep. Saria sighed and yelled at the top of her lungs.

         "Link Wake up right now or I'm going to tell everyone about what happened to you when you tried to go into the sacred forest meadow last year without my help.

         Link's eyes shot wide open as he jumped out of his bed, tackled Saria to the ground and put his hands over her mouth.

         "You promised never to speak of that!" Link yelled in panic.

         "Relax Linky" Saria giggled. "i was just joking. anyway i have a little someone here who wants to see you."

          Saria took her hand out from behind her back and reveled Navi to Link who just stared at her. After about a minute of non-blinking staring Link started to show some emotion.
121.title: To Link

1211.content:
Link quickly jumped at Navi and brought the tiny girl to his chest in a hug.

         "Navi it's really you!" he exclaimed in joy. "I thought i lost you forever why did you leave!?"

         Navi was taken aback by how much the boy missed her. She thought for sure that he would resent her with every fiber of his being. "I'm sorry" She said softly to the young boy. "I thought you were still a Hylian and fairies can't be with non-Kokiri. I didn't want to leave I just thought I had to. I'm really sorry link"

          "It's okay Navi i forgive you." Link said as he let go of her. But because of her burnt of wings she was unable to fly and fell with a scream onto Link's bed. "Navi are you okay!?" Link asked worried for the tiny girl's well-being.

         "Yeah I'm fine" The young fairy said a little unbalanced from the dissent.

         "What's wrong why didn't you just fl-." Link stopped mid-sentence as he saw her back. Link started to laugh uncontrollably as he pointed at the fairy and said. "

         Hahahah Navi what happened to your wings!? Hahahahaha."

          "Navi glared at Link as the anime anger vain appeared on her for head as she looked up at Link with her arms crossed, pouting. she said "It's not funny Link."

         "Hahaha Yes it is." Link replied as he smirked at her and said. "Navi the wingless fairy."

         That was the last straw for Navi . she charged up a mana ball and blasted Link in the forehead leaving a noticeable welt.

          "Oww!" Link yelled. rubbing the welt "That hurt."

          Navi stuck out her tongue at the Kokiri and blew raspberries.

         "Oh that is it!" Link yelled as he leaped at Navi who jumped out of the way just in time. Link chased Navi around the bed until he finally caught her.

         "You're gonna get it now" He said As he started to noogie the tiny fairy girl. Saria decided to leave the two of them alone and left.

         "Okay already you win!" Navi submitted. Link nodded and gently put her down.

         "Well that was fun" Link said. "How about we..."
1211.title: Reunion

12112.content:
"We should try to fix your wings." Link said. "Yeah, put how?" Navi asked. "Well, while you were gone, I studied a lot on the history of Fairies, and found out that only a special healing potion in Castle Town, can heal a Fairy." Link said. "Oh, but how are you gonna take me there?" Navi said. While saying this, she thought "Please not a bottle, Please not a bottle.", and Link replied with "I'm not gonna take you with me." Navi was awfully surprised.

"I'm going to leave you with Saria." Link continued. "Oh, well that's okay." Navi said with a smile. Link gently picked Navi up, and jumped down, it was a little bumpy for Navi, but she had got her cheer back, so she thought it was like a ride. Link climbed to Saria's House, and knocked on Her Door. "Hey Link." Saria said. "Can you take care of Navi until I get back from Castle Town?" Link asked. "Sure." Saria answered taking Navi from Link's hands.

Link ran off to get the Healing Potion, it was located at the Potion Shop in Castle Town.

Go with Link? Or with Saria and Navi?
12112.title: "try to fix your wings."

"What do you wanna do Navi?" Saria asked. "Well, I would like to have gone with Link, but it's obviously safer here since I cannot fly." Navi said. "Do you wanna play a game?" Saria asked. "What kind of Game?" Navi asked. "Well, 2 choices: We could play Hide and Seek, or Kokiri Adventure." Saria said.
(Kokiri Adventure is where the Kokiri and Fairy, go on a travel through Lost Woods, Get to the Sacred Forest Meadow, and then back as fast as possible)
What do Navi and Saria play until Link returns with the Potion?

121131.title: Navi the Killjoy

121132.content:
Not listening to Navi's pleas for mercy, Link drew the sandwich to his mouth and took a big chomp, ripping away a good part of the PB n J into with his mouth with his fairy guardian in his maw. He began chewing, humming at the flavor of his favorite lunch combine with the sensation of an entire fairy in his mouth. Inside his jaw, however, Navi was bounced around the Kokiri boy's mouth, whipped around by Link's undulating tongue to his teeth, all covered in soggy sandwich and saliva.

"LINK, STOP THIS PLEAE!" Navi begged as the tongue threw her up to the roof of his mouth. "LINK, LET ME OUT OF HERE! PLEASE, LINK, I DON'T WANT TO DIE! I DON'T WANT TO DIE l!"

"MMMMMMM-NOMF!" was all that Navi heard in response. To Link, tasting Navi was like sampling a cinnamon-flavored ball of light with wings tickling the inside of his throat. With a devious smile, Link tilted his head back, the ultimate scare prank that would make Navi's blue color turn completely yellow as he felt her sliding down to the back of his mouth, along with the pile of his mush PBnJ sandwich.

"NO LINK! NOOOOOOOOO!" Navi screamed bloody murder as he felt her descent to Link's esophagus. Suddenly, the Kokiri's tongue pinned her against the roof of his mouth, allowing the sandwich to be swallowed down his stomach. Link depress this tongue, allowing Navi to sob after the most terrifying experience she had her subjected to in her life. "Link... why...?"

12221.content:
Saria was a second away from making up her mind when her body did her the favor of making her decision. The tiny green-haired girl loosed a small giggle as she felt a rush of air silently slip out from under her bottom...And right onto the struggling blue fairy.

Lying face down on the table, Navi was too busy to notice Saria's quiet explusion, but it wasn't long until she smelled it. The fairy wrinkled her tiny blue nose. "Ugh, Saria, did you just...?"
"Uh-huh." Saria replied, with a petite and mischievous giggle. "And with more on the way!"
Navi's eyes widened at that, and she renewed her struggles only to be met with yet another silent cloud of poison gas. The fairy gave a disgusted moan and then began to cough and gag at the stench, with her arms trapped at her side under Saria's butt there was little she could do but breathe in Saria's farts...And pray that she did not plan to do anything worse...

Meanwhile, Saria continued to giggle as her silent-but-quite-deadly farts continued to plauge her little prisoner. She would never admit it, but Saria's vegetarian diet often left her very gassy, luckily Saria was a master of cutting loose without a sound and was often considered too damn cute to be blamed for the resulting stink. However, it was not long until...
12221.title: Stinky Saria

122211.content:
After her six or seventh fart, Saria unexpectedly felt a dangerous quiver deep within her bowels, her hindquarters suddenly felt a great deal heavier than they did a moment ago. For a moment, Saria adopted an adorably confused expression, before a hot wave of pressure shoved its way through her intestines and escaped her ass with a resounding "Bbbrrhhaaaaapp!"
She stifled a moan, bending over slightly at the unexpectedly forceful emission, her mouth forming a slient "O" of suprise.

Her uncomfort paled in comparison to Navi's however; as the tiny fairy was suddenly hit by a hot blast of stinking wind. Navi audiably gasped, her face contorting in disgust, she honestly couldn't belive the smells this tiny girl was producing.

Saria herself coudn't belive it either, granted, her gas always stank to high-heaven but this was somthing else! She let out an audiable groan as her insides pulsed again, letting out another whirlwind of methane. "FLLLRRROOOOOOOOPP!!"
The green-haired girl let out another groan, this one of disgust as the rotten smell rose up to great her, a smell that she vainly tried to wave away.

Navi still had it worse though, luckily, Saria's more recent squirming allowed the fairy to wiggle an arm loose and tightly pinch her nose, but the heavy smell of rotted and digested food still found a way into her nostirls. "Saria!" She gasped desperately, her voice slightly altered by her pinched nose. "Make it stop! Please!!"

Saria's eye twitched as her insides protested again, she had heard Navi's plea, but her body seemed wholly unwilling to obey her. "I-I'm sorry, Navi...B-But- Urgh!"
"BFFFFFRRRRRAAAAAATTTTT!"
122211.title: REALLY stinky Saria

Nonononononononononononononononono!" was the last words Navi said before being sat on. A brown river of diarrhea poured out of Saria's rump, right on to Navi! And it kept coming, too! 15.title: Other rooms and adult option

151.content:
Navi had a vague feeling of dejavu but she couldn't quite place it. But it became all too obvious when Ruto walked into the room.

"Good morning Navi! I hope your feeling better!"

"R-Ruto? What am I doing here?"

"Well I found you after you got struck by lightning, I brought you back here and started to nurse you back to health. You've been out for over a week!"

Navi was about to thank Ruto for her help when she noticed something. Her balance was completely out of whack and her back was cold, that was when she noticed it.

"M-My wings! What happened to my wings?!"

"I'm afraid they got zapped off your body, you're really lucky to be alive. I do have some good news though..."

"Oh yeah? What's that?" asked Navi skeptically.

"I've wrote Link a letter telling him all that's happened..."

Navi's heart filled with hope.

"And I've told him that the only way how I'll ever agree to giving you back is if he marries me!! Isn't that wonderful?"

How does Navi react?
151.title: A room with a water theme (Ruto)

choices: Gets angry and plays with/tortures her
1511.content:
"What the hell Ruto!" Navi yelled . "I'm not a bargaining chip for you to use to get married!"

Navi banged her fists against the bottle rapidly in a sad attempt for freedom.

"Let me go Ruto you have no right to do this!" Navi continued to scream "i'm a person not some kinda of toy that can be traded! let me out let me out!!!"

How does Ruto react?
1511.title: Navi starts yelling

15111.content: "There's nothing you can do, you're a weak fairy in a bottle". Ruto then opened the top of the jar and
15111.title: Gets angry and plays with/tortures her

choices: Link comes to do the deal
Continue the gassing of the fairy
151111.content: Tito let out a loud fart, followed by several smaller farts. Navi said "stop, please, anything but this" Ruto responded with an sbd, making the inside of the jar horrendous for navi. Ruto said "if you want out, you gotta go through my butt". Navi's heart sank as she reluctantly flew into the fish princess's slimy butt, which added to the lingering smell of farts, then Ruto chainsaw farted, making it worse. Expecting Ruto to let her free now, navi had her hopes up, but then Ruto pushed the small fairy's body up to her slimy and stinky hole, and kept farting non-stop, only taking breaks to ensure navi didn't get ko'd, she would torture navi day in and day out until link agrees to the deal to marry her, navi weakly shouts "you lying bitch" and then Ruto said "I never said how long you'll have to be in my butt, and depending on link's answer, it might be five minutes, or forever"

info.brief_description: Navi is captured by a Zelda character from OoT/MM and you decide her fate.
info.description:
Rules
Keep it age appropriate most of the characters in this story are kids so no sexual content (unless you pick the AC mode where anything goes)

Also i will allow The Kind and Cruel captors so some one can either help Navi until she can fly again (explained in the first chapter) or torture and humiliate her just make sure to keep both options open for other people
if you choose a kind captor you may turn this into an adventure story if you wish

I will delete almost nothing unless it makes no sense

I ask you do not kill her just try to make the story good okay.

(Note: This takes place after Ocarina of Time when Link is tuned back into a kid and 0ni this one he's a Kokiri)
.
info.pretty_title: The Legend of Zelda: Captured Navi
